channel.title: [DEV] Minecraft/runescape Toplist [DEV]
channel.description:
Hello, My name is joshua and im just here to show you guys a new website im working on, if your interested in joining it please PM me, the link wont be approved tell a mod approves it.
[size=18pt][b][Features][/b][/size]
Votifier Vote System complex managing system admin panel and user panel adsense ready changeable pagination on the servers list nice design built with bootstrap servers list management with admin panel search option to find the servers you are looking for more easly live stats banners with embed codes for each server votes option to decide what server is the best and more…
[size=18pt][b][Screen shots][/b][/size]
[IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/25z155g.png[/img]

item.description:
@pkerjosh13 wrote:

Hello, My name is joshua and im just here to show you guys a new website im working on, if your interested in joining it please PM me, the link wont be approved tell a mod approves it.

[size=18pt][Features][/size]

Votifier Vote System
complex managing system
admin panel and user panel
adsense ready
changeable pagination on the servers list
nice design built with bootstrap
servers list management with admin panel
search option to find the servers you are looking for more easly
live stats banners with embed codes for each server
votes option to decide what server is the best
and more…
